mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 顧客.顧客 (顧客ID, 顧客番号, 顧客姓, 顧客名, 顧客姓カナ, 顧客名カナ, 個人法人区分) VALUES ( #{customer.customerId.value}, #{customerNumber.value}, #{customer.name.lastName}, #{customer.name.firstName}, #{customer.name.lastName}, #{customer.name.firstName}, #{customer.type} )
mapper.select: SELECT 顧客ID AS "code.value", 顧客姓 AS "name.value", 顧客名 FROM 顧客.顧客

SELECT 顧客ID AS "code.value", 顧客姓 AS "name.lastName", 顧客名 AS "name.firstName", 顧客姓カナ AS "nameKana.lastName", 顧客名カナ AS "nameKana.firstName" FROM 顧客.顧客 WHERE 顧客姓 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{customerSearchCriteria.customerName}, '%') OR 顧客名 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{customerSearchCriteria.customerName}, '%') OR 顧客姓カナ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{customerSearchCriteria.customerName}, '%') OR 顧客名カナ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{customerSearchCriteria.customerName}, '%')
